time_markers.text: Over the course of two decades
quotes: Over the course of two decades, Salim was one of the pivotal coordinators of the continent’s liberation struggles, raising awareness of the liberation movement worldwide.

organizations.name: UN
quotes: These media included publications such as Decolonization, which highlighted key geo-political developments in the region and UN activities related to these issues; the UN Yearbook and Monthly Chronicle; the UN’s thematic radio programmes, such as ‘Perspective’, which was broadcast in more than 140 countries and 12 languages; UN Africa; feature films produced independently and by the UN; and broadcasts of UN working meetings and international conferences.

organizations.name: UN information centres
quotes: Salim raised the level of collaboration with UN information centres around the world, which became critical for effectively disseminating and receiving information about developments in southern Africa, and for coordinating the publicity of key international solidarity campaigns and activities.

organizations.name: UN Special Committee on Decolonization
quotes: Through his continual consultations with leading NGOs, Salim also ensured the participation and coordination of the UN Special Committee on Decolonization’s activities during the annual International Week of Solidarity with the Colonial Peoples of Southern Africa Fighting for Freedom, Independence and Equal Rights.

organizations.name: ACCORD
quotes: Vasu Gounden is the founder and executive director of ACCORD.

roles.title: founder and executive director of ACCORD
quotes: Vasu Gounden is the founder and executive director of ACCORD.

roles.title: conflict-management trainer
quotes: An experienced conflict-management trainer, he has been involved in preparing conflicting parties across Africa for negotiations, including rebel groups in Burundi and the DRC.

roles.title: mediation support provider
quotes: He has provided mediation support to the South African facilitators of the Burundi peace process, which included former president Nelson Mandela, President Jacob Zuma and Minister Charles Nqakula.

roles.title: adviser on mediation strategy
quotes: He was an adviser on mediation strategy to Botswana’s former president, Ketumile.

He was an adviser on mediation strategy to Botswana’s former president, Ketumile.
